text: innum nam kattalaiyaik kontu (makkalukku) nervali kattum imamkalaka - talaivarkalaka - nam avarkalai akkinom; melum, nanmaiyutaiya ceyalkalaik puriyumarum, tolukaiyaik kataippitikkumarum, jakattai kotuttu varumarum, nam avarkalukku vahi mulam arivittom - avarkal nam'maiye vanankupavarkalaka iruntanar
